src.stat package#

Submodules#

src.stat.statistics module#

Module for statistics

class src.stat.statistics.Stat(work: Worksite, pathoutput: str, type_point: list | None = None)[source]#

Bases: object

Calculates site statistics.

main_stat_and_save() → None[source]#

Calculates and saves all site statistics.

main_stat_image_to_world() → None[source]#

Calculates residual and statistics on control point for image to world function.

main_stat_world_to_image() → None[source]#

Calculates residual and statistics on control point for world to image function.

save_stat_txt() → None[source]#

Save calculation statistics in a .txt file.

stat_image_to_world() → None[source]#

Calculates residual of controle point for image to world. residual = ground control point - calculated ground control point

stat_list(data_list: list) → dict[source]#

Calculates statistics on residual data. Min, Max, Median, Mean, Var, Sigma arithmetic and absolute.

Parameters:

data_list (list) – List of data.

stat_world_to_image() → None[source]#

Calculates residual of controle point for world to image. residual = image’s ground point - calculated image’s ground point

write_stat(file: TextIOWrapper, data: dict) → None[source]#

Write dictionary data statistics of the stat_list function on a file.

Parameters:

  • file (io.TextIOWrapper) – File to write on.

  • data (dict) – Dictionary on data statistics to stat_list.
